page_content:
Viewing GRP XS ELS graph

Version:MissionOS_2.0

Follow the steps below to view the newly created GRP_XS_ELS group graph:

  1. Firstly, go to the Portal Homepage.
  2. Clear Cache of the browser if required.

 

 

 

  1. Then click Refresh icon of the portal URL.
  2. Select the Instrument Type as GRP_XS_ELS. The created group appear in the Instrument Selection Select the required group to load for viewing.
  3. Now click View Large to view the graph. Here you can view the different instruments of varying shapes displayed. The excavation area, selected D-Wall / Piles, and Struts set up at the Display Group interface will be displaying in the Graph.
